text: Robbie Hedges was the chief of the Peoria tribe of Indians of Oklahoma. In 2000 she was the first woman to be elected to the position. Hedges, a former office manager, found that there were no other candidates when Chief Joe Goforth resigned. She decided to run in part based on the tradition of tribal service set by her grandmother, who had lived to age 108. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Female Native American leaders
title: Robbie Hedges
